import Footer from '../../components/Footer/footer' import Navigation from '../../components/Navigation/navigation' import Account from '../../components/Account/account' import UserHeader from '../../components/UserHeader/header' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router' import './user.css' function User() { document.title = "Argent Bank - User's Page" let navigate = useNavigate() const { token } = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) useEffect(() => { if (!token) { navigate('/login') } }, [token, navigate]) return ( <>

Accounts

) } export default User;
